notes.text:
Vennu has some cool combos with CAs. For example:
Summon Dakini - Dakini floodgated - summon Vennu sacking Dakini - end phase Dakini gets back to the field (primal cry eff) - Dakini recycling eff activates
Idaten Benten combo - search for Vennu and Primal cry - summon Vennu sacking Idaten - Idaten gets back to the field at end phase
Vennu eff can also recycle sonic bird if needed

Hard thing about this deck is deciding if it's worth it to sub a 3rd Saffira for Vennu
